item.title: Trump’s Tariff on Cheap Chinese Imports Will Cost Big Tech Billions
item.description: For Meta, Alphabet and other platforms, the elimination of the tariff exemption for inexpensive goods is already cutting into advertising revenue.

item.title: Ghana Wanted a Cathedral. It Got an ‘Expensive Hole’ Instead.
item.description: The nation had grand plans for a national cathedral designed by a celebrity architect. The $400 million project became a political battleground.

item.title: Sam Altman’s Start-Up Launches Eye-Scanning Crypto Orbs in the U.S.
item.description: World, a start-up backed by Sam Altman, has launched in the United States with the goal of verifying your humanity.

item.title: Car Prices Expected to Rise as Tariffs on Parts Kick In
item.description: Tariffs on imported parts will have a broad impact because all vehicles use components made abroad.

item.title: 2 Planes Abort Landings as Army Helicopter Flies Near D.C. Airport
item.description: The episode followed a fatal collision between a military helicopter and a commercial jet in January, and prompted concern and outrage among officials...
